about_the_game:
Make It Count is a 1-3 players Co-op, post-apocalyptic, top-down shooter with roguelite elements.
As the last survivors of humanity, it is your duty to exterminate this filth from the infested earth. Set out on your mission and get stronger by finding various trinkets! Collect meaningful resources to upgrade and unlock new classes&weapons. Quench your bloodlust by eradicating these abominations!

Key Features


  • MAKE IT COUNT
Ammo is limited in Make It Count, it is not scarce but you have to make your shots count! Scavenging ammo and other useful things on missions is a must! Or you can always pull out your melee weapon and slash!

  • MISSION
Different paths may open up for each run! Routes will be randomized, it is not infinite but will provide variety for different mini-missions in-game and trinkets!


  • FOG OF WAR
Be careful! Your vision is limited and danger lurks everywhere!


  • CUSTOMIZATION
When chilling out in your HUB area, you can upgrade your weapons and characters. That’s not all! You can also craft various decorations in your HUB to make it visually appealing to your eye!

content_descriptors.notes: Make It Count includes killing zombies and show of gore throughout the game.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 or later
  • Processor: Intel Core i3-6100 3.7GHz or similar
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce 750 or similar
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: 64-bit operating system is required
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 or later
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-7500 3.80GHz or similar
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 1050 series or similar
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: 64-bit operating system is required

short_description: Make It Count is a 1-3 players Co-op, post-apocalyptic, top-down shooter with roguelite elements. Venture into your mission with randomized routes, find trinkets and bring carnage to the filth that is infesting this world!
supported_languages: English, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Japanese, Korean, Polish, Portuguese - Brazil, Russian, Simplified Chinese, Turkish
